trans-unit.source: A module for synchronizing content from a production system to a single or multiple target systems.
trans-unit.target: Moduli ya kusawazisha maudhui kutoka mfumo wa uzalishaji hadi mfumo mmoja au mifumo mingi lengwa.

trans-unit.source: Force a full sync. A full sync of this item is initiated even if an incremental sync is possible. This should be avoided if possible.
trans-unit.target: Lazimisha usawazishaji kamili. Usawazishaji kamili wa kipengee hiki unaanzishwa hata kama usawazishaji wa nyongeza unawezekana. Hii inapaswa kuepukwa ikiwezekana.

trans-unit.source: Deletes obsolete records on the target system. Any records that are marked as hidden or deleted, or where the record end time is a date in the past, will be deleted on the target system.
trans-unit.target: Inafuta rekodi zilizopitwa na wakati kwenye mfumo lengwa. Rekodi zozote zilizoashiriwa kuwa zimefichwa au zimefutwa, au ambapo muda wa mwisho wa rekodi ni tarehe ya zamani, zitafutwa kwenye mfumo lengwa.

trans-unit.source: {files} file(s) waiting for synchronisation {size}. Oldest file from {oldestFile} and therefore {minutes} minutes old.
trans-unit.target: Faili {files} zinasubiri usawazishaji {size}. Faili ya zamani zaidi kutoka {oldestFile} na kwa hiyo ina umri wa dakika {minutes}.

trans-unit.source: Selected page and all {pages} sub pages
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa uliochaguliwa na kurasa za ndani {pages} zote

trans-unit.source: (of which {deleted} are deleted, {noaccess} are blocked, and {falses} have the wrong page type)
trans-unit.target: (ambapo {deleted} zimefutwa, {noaccess} zimezuiwa, na {falses} zina aina ya ukurasa isiyo sahihi)
(kurasa za ndani {pages} na {deleted} zimefutwa na {noaccess} hazipatikani)

trans-unit.source: There are restricted subareas which are excluded from sync.
trans-unit.target: Kuna maeneo madogo yaliyozuiliwa ambayo hayajumuishwi katika sync.

trans-unit.source: Target '{target}' could not be notified due to an error.
trans-unit.target: Lengo '{target}' halikuweza kuarifishwa kwa sababu ya kosa.

trans-unit.source: Skipped signaling '{target}' target. Unknown notify type: '{notify_type}'.
trans-unit.target: Kuarifu lengo '{target}' kumerukwa. Aina ya arifa isiyojulikana: '{notify_type}'.

trans-unit.source: Skipped signaling '{target}' target due to signaling disabled.
trans-unit.target: Kuarifu lengo '{target}' kumerukwa kwa sababu arifa zimezimwa.

trans-unit.source: Skipped signaling '{target}' target due to invalid context. Allowed contexts: {allowed_contexts}
trans-unit.target: Kuarifu lengo '{target}' kumerukwa kwa sababu ya muktadha batili. Muktadha unaoruhusuliwa: {allowed_contexts}

trans-unit.source: Table '{table}' skipped - no changes since last sync.
trans-unit.target: Jedwali '{table}' limerukwa - hakuna mabadiliko tangu usawazishaji wa mwisho.

trans-unit.source: Sync started - should be processed within in next 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Sync imeanza - inapaswa kuchakatwa ndani ya dakika 15 zijazo.
Faili {number} za URL za hook zimeundwa

trans-unit.source: No data dumped for further processing. The selected sync process did not produce any data to be synced to the target system.
trans-unit.target: Hakuna data iliyotupwa kwa usindikaji zaidi. Mchakato wa sync uliochaguliwa haukuzalisha data yoyote ya kusawazishwa kwenye mfumo lengwa.

trans-unit.source: System '{target}' is locked, so no url file is created.
trans-unit.target: Mfumo '{target}' umefungwa, kwa hiyo hakuna faili ya url iliyoundwa.

trans-unit.source: Following tables have changed, please contact your TYPO3 admin:
trans-unit.target: Majedwali yafuatayo yamebadilika, tafadhali wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa TYPO3:

trans-unit.source: System '{system} is locked so no dump-file is created for it.
trans-unit.target: Mfumo '{system} umefungwa kwa hiyo hakuna faili ya dump iliyoundwa kwa ajili yake.

trans-unit.source: Please select a page from the page tree.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali chagua ukurasa kutoka kwenye mti wa kurasa.

trans-unit.source: Could not load record for selected page: {page_selected}
trans-unit.target: Haikuweza kupakia rekodi kwa ukurasa uliochaguliwa: {page_selected}

trans-unit.source: The page type must not be synchronized.

trans-unit.target: Faili ya hali ya jedwali haiwezi kuandikwa.

trans-unit.source: There are no pages marked to sync.
trans-unit.target: Hakuna kurasa zilizowekwa alama kwa sync.

trans-unit.source: There ist already a sync-preparation in progress. Please retry in about 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Tayari kuna maandalizi ya sync yanayoendelea. Tafadhali jaribu tena baada ya dakika 5.

trans-unit.source: Zipfile for {file} could not be created.
trans-unit.target: Faili ya Zip kwa ajili ya {file} haikuweza kuundwa.

trans-unit.source: File {file} could not be moved to {target}.
Please select how the page should be marked.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali chagua jinsi ukurasa unavyopaswa kuwekwa alama.

trans-unit.source: The page has been already marked for synchronisation
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa tayari umewekwa alama kwa usawazishaji

trans-unit.source: MM tables like {tableName} are not supported anymore.
trans-unit.target: Majedwali ya MM kama {tableName} hayatumiwi tena.

trans-unit.source: FAL has corrupted entries. (Entries with uid_foreign = 0)
trans-unit.target: FAL ina maingizo yaliyoharibika. (Maingizo yenye uid_foreign = 0)

trans-unit.source: This tasks can take some time, please be patient.
trans-unit.target: Kazi hii inaweza kuchukua muda, tafadhali kuwa na uvumilivu.
TYPO3: Watumiaji na vikundi vya backend
TYPO3: Kurasa za moja na maudhui
